trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANARK101_04551_SEQ_00<tab>Maru wants YOU to promote the Hippo Riders.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANARK101_04551_TODO_00<tab>Distribute the Hippo Rider handbills.
TEXT_BANARK101_04551_TODO_01<tab>Report back to Maru.
TEXT_BANARK101_04551_MARU_000_001<tab>I promised the boss I'd try an' get the cart rollin', but lazin' about here ain't exactly goin' to make a job of it...
TEXT_BANARK101_04551_MARU_000_002<tab>It ain't much, but I tried makin' some handbills... You think you could pass 'em out around Yedlihmad?

TEXT_BANARK101_04551_MARU_000_003<tab>Tell folks that if they bring back one of these, they'll get a discount. That sounds professional, right? Anyhow, I'll leave the talkin' to you─I know you'll explain it good.
TEXT_BANARK101_04551_DOCKER04551_000_010<tab>You have business with me?
TEXT_BANARK101_04551_DOCKER04551_000_011<tab>A start-up delivery service...by hippo cart? And here I thought chocobo carriages were the only viable option. What an intriguing angle.

TEXT_BANARK101_04551_DOCKER04551_000_012<tab>I only off-load luggage, so delivery arrangements are out of my hands, but I'll take this to my friends at the harbor guild. They may yet find some use for it.
TEXT_BANARK101_04551_DOCKER04551_000_013<tab>Oh, the Hippo Riders! Yes, my friend at the harbor guild tried them straightaway. Wouldn't stop gushing about their speedy carts.
TEXT_BANARK101_04551_DOCKER04551_000_014<tab>If you could spare a few more handbills, I know of some others who will appreciate that discount!
TEXT_BANARK101_04551_DOCKER04551_000_015<tab>I'll be sure to pass this along.
TEXT_BANARK101_04551_TRADERWOMAN04551_000_016<tab>May I help you?

TEXT_BANARK101_04551_TRADERWOMAN04551_000_017<tab>A delivery service! By hippo cart, no less. This is perfect timing─it just so happens that I need a parcel delivered to the Giantsgall Grounds without delay.
TEXT_BANARK101_04551_TRADERWOMAN04551_000_018<tab>“Fastest on the island,” are they? I shall certainly put them to the test! Thank you, I'll head over straightaway.
TEXT_BANARK101_04551_TRADERWOMAN04551_000_019<tab>Those speedy Hippo Riders! No false advertising there─they had my package to its recipient in no time at all. Count me a satisfied customer!
TEXT_BANARK101_04551_TRADERWOMAN04551_000_020<tab>I daresay it's time to redeem my second discount. I wonder if I could persuade them into a fixed contract...
TEXT_BANARK101_04551_THINKINGARKASODARA04551_000_021<tab>Something for me?
TEXT_BANARK101_04551_THINKINGARKASODARA04551_000_022<tab>Oh! The Hippo Riders! I know a fellow who works there!
TEXT_BANARK101_04551_THINKINGARKASODARA04551_000_023<tab>Nothing would make me happier than supporting an Arkasodara-run business like this. I simply must find something for them to deliver!
TEXT_BANARK101_04551_THINKINGARKASODARA04551_000_024<tab>Out promoting the Hippo Riders again? I found something to deliver, and they had it in Radz-at-Han in no time at all─and at a discount!
TEXT_BANARK101_04551_THINKINGARKASODARA04551_000_025<tab>Of course, I'll be needing it shipped back now, so could I trouble you for another handbill? Oh, and some extras for my friends!
TEXT_BANARK101_04551_MARU_000_030<tab>Handed out the handbills, have you?
TEXT_BANARK101_04551_MARU_000_031<tab>I'm glad we piqued some interest. Handin' out adverts ain't glamorous, but it sure gets the job done...
TEXT_BANARK101_04551_MARU_000_032<tab>I'll keep thinkin' up new ways of gettin' our name out there. Come by again when you've got the time...
